articles.title: LeBron, Lakers prep for 'next challenge' after winning Game 3 - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: A reserved LeBron James, after the Lakers' Game 3 win over Golden State gave Los Angeles a 2-1 series lead, spoke about moving forward in his postgame availability, saying the grind of the playoffs is "all about training your mind for the next challenge."
